userStories.title: Create new route for UI Sampler page
userStories.description: Set up routing infrastructure for the UI sampler page at /ui-sampler. Integrate with existing React Router configuration in the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Route is accessible from main navigation (add nav link in appropriate location)
Page component structure is created with proper TypeScript types
Empty page renders with basic layout container
userStories.notes: Need to check existing Router configuration in App.tsx and determine where to add the sampler route. May need to extend routing structure.

userStories.title: Implement sidebar navigation with collapsible sections
userStories.description: Create responsive sidebar navigation with collapsible sections for each component category. Must support mobile/responsive behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar component created with proper TypeScript types
Collapsible sections for: Typography, Colors, Primitives, Patterns, Visualizations
Active section highlighting based on scroll position
Mobile: Hamburger menu with slide-out sidebar
Keyboard accessible (Tab, Enter, Space for collapse/expand)
WCAG AA compliant (contrast ratios, focus indicators)
userStories.notes: Consider using the existing TabGroup pattern for section navigation if it fits, or build custom collapsible nav. Must handle 5 main categories.

userStories.title: Set up live interactive preview infrastructure
userStories.description: Create a reusable preview component that renders live, interactive component examples. This will be the foundation for all component demonstrations.
acceptanceCriteria: Live rendering of components (not static screenshots)
Component is fully interactive (clicks, inputs work)
Visual separation between preview and code examples
Support for multiple examples per component
Copy-to-clipboard button for each code example
Responsive preview that works on all screen sizes
Preview has visual boundary/border for clarity
userStories.notes: This is the core infrastructure component. All other stories will depend on this. Must ensure it can handle any component type passed to it.

userStories.title: Typography sampler implementation
userStories.description: Display all typography styles available in the design system with live examples and usage guidelines.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows all font sizes (xs through 7xl) from design tokens
Shows all font weights (normal, medium, semibold, bold)
Live examples of each text style
Copyable code snippet for each typography class
WCAG AA contrast verification for all examples
userStories.notes: Reference tokens.ts for complete typography scale. Should include semantic text roles (primary, secondary, disabled, etc.)

userStories.title: Color palette visualization
userStories.description: Visual display of all color tokens including primary, secondary, accent, semantic colors, and gradients with copyable hex/rgb values.
userStories.notes: Must reference tailwind.config.js for complete color definitions. Include both light and dark mode variants.

userStories.title: Button component sampler
userStories.description: Complete Button component examples showing all variants, sizes, states, and accessibility features.
acceptanceCriteria: All variants: primary, secondary, accent, outline, ghost, danger, aurora, nova, aurora-fast, aurora-static, gradient-primary
States: default, hover, active, focus, disabled, loading
Focus indicators visible and WCAG compliant
userStories.notes: Leverage existing Button.tsx component. Include visual examples of all 11 variants defined in the codebase.

userStories.title: Card component sampler
userStories.description: Card component examples showing all variants, padding options, and layout patterns.
acceptanceCriteria: All variants: base, elevated, outlined, filled
All padding options: none, sm, md, lg, xl
Card with CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, CardFooter
userStories.notes: Reference existing Card.tsx component structure. Show complete card composition patterns.

userStories.title: Input component sampler
userStories.description: Input field examples with all states, icons, error handling, and accessibility features.
acceptanceCriteria: All input types (text, email, password, number)
WCAG AA: proper labels, error announcements
userStories.notes: Include form validation patterns and ARIA live regions for errors.

userStories.title: Textarea component sampler
userStories.description: Textarea examples with rows, error states, and helper text.
userStories.notes: Similar patterns to Input but for multi-line text entry.

userStories.title: Select component sampler
userStories.description: Select dropdown examples with all features including error states and placeholder.
userStories.notes: Ensure keyboard navigation works (arrow keys, Enter, Escape).

userStories.title: Modal component sampler
userStories.description: Modal dialog examples with different sizes, content structures, and interaction patterns.
acceptanceCriteria: Modal with header, content, and footer
Close functionality (X button, backdrop click, Escape key)
WCAG AA: focus management, ARIA attributes
userStories.notes: Critical to test keyboard trapping and focus restoration. Must reference existing Modal.tsx implementation.

userStories.title: Tooltip component sampler
userStories.description: Tooltip examples showing all positions, delays, and accessibility features.
acceptanceCriteria: All positions: top, bottom, left, right
userStories.notes: Must ensure tooltips work on keyboard focus, not just hover.

userStories.title: Badge, Spinner, ThemeToggle component sampler
userStories.description: Examples for remaining primitive components: Badge variants/sizes, Spinner variants/sizes, ThemeToggle functionality.
acceptanceCriteria: Badge: all variants (primary, secondary, accent, success, error, warning, info, neutral)
Spinner: all sizes (sm, md, lg, xl)
Spinner: all variants (primary, secondary, accent, neutral)
userStories.notes: ThemeToggle is interactive - clicking must change theme. Use existing ThemeProvider integration.

userStories.title: Pattern components sampler
userStories.description: Display reusable patterns: StageContainer, StageIndicators, TabGroup with usage examples.
acceptanceCriteria: WCAG AA compliance for all patterns
userStories.notes: These are higher-level patterns. Show how they compose primitives.

userStories.title: Visualization components overview
userStories.description: Overview page of available visualization components with links to detailed examples.
acceptanceCriteria: Brief description of each visualization type
Screenshots or thumbnails of each visualization
Link to live examples if applicable
userStories.notes: Visualizations are complex - this is an overview. May need separate detailed pages for each visualization type if full examples are needed.

userStories.title: Category landing pages and documentation
userStories.description: Each category section (Typography, Colors, etc.) should have an introductory landing with usage guidelines and best practices.
acceptanceCriteria: Each category has a landing page/section header
userStories.notes: Helps developers understand not just HOW to use components, but WHEN and WHY.

userStories.title: WCAG AA compliance audit and verification
userStories.description: Systematic verification that all sampler components meet WCAG 2.2 AA standards.
acceptanceCriteria: Color contrast ratios verified (4.5:1 for text, 3:1 for UI)
Keyboard navigation works for all interactive elements
Error identification and description for form elements
All components tested with keyboard-only navigation
userStories.notes: This is a critical requirement. Each component example must be verified before launch. May need automated testing tools.

userStories.title: Copy-to-clipboard functionality for all code examples
userStories.description: Add copy button to all code snippets with visual feedback and error handling.
acceptanceCriteria: Copy button appears on all code blocks
Visual feedback on successful copy (toast, button state change)
Error handling if clipboard API fails
userStories.notes: Uses browser Clipboard API. Must handle older browsers gracefully.

userStories.title: Search and filter functionality
userStories.description: Real-time search across all component categories to quickly find specific components or styles.
acceptanceCriteria: Search input in sidebar or header
Searches component names, descriptions, and keywords
userStories.notes: Nice-to-have for large component library. Can be Phase 2 if needed.

userStories.title: Performance optimization and testing
userStories.description: Ensure sampler page loads quickly and performs well with all live components.
acceptanceCriteria: Tested on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge
userStories.notes: With many interactive components, performance is important. May need code splitting by category.

userStories.title: Final QA and accessibility audit
userStories.description: Comprehensive testing across devices, browsers, and assistive technologies.
acceptanceCriteria: All user stories marked as passes
Mobile responsive testing on iOS and Android
userStories.notes: Gate for production deployment. Must have sign-off on accessibility.

userStories.title: Documentation and deployment preparation
userStories.description: Create developer documentation and prepare for production deployment.
acceptanceCriteria: README for sampler page added to project docs
Contribution guide for adding new components
userStories.notes: Documentation helps future developers maintain and extend the sampler.
